entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is introduced as the new teacher who will be using a Ministry-approved method to teach the class.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as the authority that approves the teaching methods used by Professor Umbridge.

entities.name: professor quirrell
entities.description: Professor Quirrell is mentioned as a previous teacher who may have been more lenient with his students.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as the student who makes a comment about Professor Quirrell.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as being stuck out of the back of Professor Quirrell's head.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge is affiliated with the Ministry, as she mentions that her teaching method is approved by them.
Harry Potter makes a comment about Professor Quirrell's teaching style.
Lord Voldemort is possessed by or stuck out of the back of Professor Quirrell's head.
